4013.verse: وَوَهَبْنَا|And We granted|127|141|5787$لَهُۥٓ|[to] him|73|100|977$أَهْلَهُۥ|his family|81|108|1157$وَمِثْلَهُم|and a like of them|139|166|11888$مَّعَهُمْ|with them,|91|118|876$رَحْمَةً|a Mercy|78|92|2636$مِّنَّا|from Us|70|141|1169$وَذِكْرَىٰ|and a Reminder|121|262|6244$لِأُوْلِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ|for those of understanding.|201|272|14856$

4016.verse: إِنَّآ|Indeed, We|96|128|120$أَخْلَصْنَـٰهُم|[We] chose them|135|200|14864$بِخَالِصَةٍ|for an exclusive (quality);|191|256|14865$ذِكْرَى|remembrance|108|140|5701$ٱلدَّارِ|(of) the Home.|118|118|9434$

4017.verse: وَإِنَّهُمْ|And indeed, they|133|153|5517$عِندَنَا|to Us|71|111|3425$لَمِنَ|(are) from|87|127|1196$ٱلْمُصْطَفَيْنَ|the chosen ones,|135|175|14866$ٱلْأَخْيَارِ|the best.|89|109|14867$

4018.verse: وَٱذْكُرْ|And remember|114|129|2841$إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ|Ismail|101|131|9651$وَٱلْيَسَعَ|and Al-Yasa|100|130|5797$وَذَا ٱلْكِفْلِ‌ۖ|and Dhul-kifl,|112|142|11891$وَكُلٌّ|and all|63|93|7324$مِّنَ|(are) from|87|102|156$ٱلْأَخْيَارِ|the best.|89|89|14867$

4019.verse: هَـٰذَا|This|59|82|248$ذِكْرٌ‌ۚ|(is) a Reminder.|124|170|6496$وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|144|713$لِلْمُتَّقِينَ|for the righteous|131|177|34$لَحُسْنَ|surely, is a good|129|152|14868$مَــَٔابٍ|place of return,|123|123|9454$

4022.verse: ۞ وَعِندَهُمْ|And with them|139|179|14618$قَـٰصِرَٲتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ|(will be) companions of modest gaze|262|342|14619$أَتْرَابٌ|well-matched.|114|154|14874$

4023.verse: هَـٰذَا|This|59|82|248$مَا|(is) what|80|126|262$تُوعَدُونَ|you are promised|133|180|6059$لِيَوْمِ|for (the) Day|107|154|11812$ٱلْحِسَابِ|(of) Account.|110|133|1790$

4025.verse: هَـٰذَا‌ۚ|This (is so)!|99|107|248$وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|114|713$لِلطَّـٰغِينَ|for the transgressors|159|174|14877$لَشَرَّ|surely (is) an evil|134|150|14878$مَــَٔابٍ|place of return.|123|131|9454$

4026.verse: جَهَنَّمَ|Hell;|69|100|2655$يَصْلَوْنَهَا|they will burn therein|160|221|9616$فَبِئْسَ|and wretched is|126|187|3596$ٱلْمِهَادُ|the resting place.|137|168|1814$

4027.verse: هَـٰذَا|This (is so)!|99|131|248$فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ|Then let them taste it,|172|236|14879$حَمِيمٌ|boiling fluid|93|157|14880$وَغَسَّاقٌ|and purulence.|118|150|14881$

4013.verse: And We granted him his family and a like [number] with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for those of understanding.

4014.verse: [We said], "And take in your hand a bunch [of grass] and strike with it and do not break your oath." Indeed, We found him patient, an excellent servant. Indeed, he was one repeatedly turning back [to Allah].

4015.verse: And remember Our servants, Abraham, Isaac and Jacob - those of strength and [religious] vision.

4016.verse: Indeed, We chose them for an exclusive quality: remembrance of the home [of the Hereafter].

4017.verse: And indeed they are, to Us, among the chosen and outstanding.

4018.verse: And remember Ishmael, Elisha and Dhul-Kifl, and all are among the outstanding.

4019.verse: This is a reminder. And indeed, for the righteous is a good place of return

4020.verse: Gardens of perpetual residence, whose doors will be opened to them.

4021.verse: Reclining within them, they will call therein for abundant fruit and drink.

4022.verse: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances and of equal age.

4023.verse: This is what you, [the righteous], are promised for the Day of Account.

4024.verse: Indeed, this is Our provision; for it there is no depletion.

4025.verse: This [is so]. But indeed, for the transgressors is an evil place of return -

4026.verse: Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the resting place.

4027.verse: This - so let them taste it - is scalding water and [foul] purulence.

4028.verse: And other [punishments] of its type [in various] kinds.

4029.verse: [Its inhabitants will say], "This is a company bursting in with you. No welcome for them. Indeed, they will burn in the Fire."

4030.verse: They will say, "Nor you! No welcome for you. You, [our leaders], brought this upon us, and wretched is the settlement."

4031.verse: They will say, "Our Lord, whoever brought this upon us - increase for him double punishment in the Fire."
